column1: Friends will be received on Monday from 2-4
column2: 6-8 PM in the Cicholski-Zidek Funeral Home
column5: where a blessing service will be held on Tuesday at 9:30 AM. Mass of Christian Burial will follow at 10 AM in Most Blessed Sacrament Church with his pastor the Rev. James Mazurek as celebrant. Burial with full military honors accorded by the Tarentum VFW will be in Mt. Airy Cemetery
